hudson.tasks.Shell.command:
source /home/test/.bashrc #Set the below parameters manually package_name="snappy-java" published_version="1.1.7"
#Check distro and available version in repo : rhel7.x, Sles11.x/12.x, Ub16.x/17.x . /etc/os-release if [ $ID == "rhel" ]; then available_version=$(sudo yum info $package_name | grep Version | head -1 | cut -d ':' -f 2| cut -d ' ' -f 2) elif [ $ID == "sles" ]; then available_version=$(sudo zypper info $package_name | grep Version | head -1 | cut -d ':' -f 2| cut -d ' ' -f 2) elif [ $ID == "ubuntu" ]; then available_version=$(sudo apt-get update && sudo apt-cache policy $package_name | grep Candidate | head -1 | cut -d ' ' -f 4) fi
if [[ $available_version == *"$published_version"* ]]; then echo "Version $published_version is already available in repo" echo "Exact name: $available_version ... Failing" exit 1 else echo "Published version is not available in repo. Going ahead." fi cat /etc/redhat-release export WORK_DIR=`pwd` # Install dependencies sudo yum install -y automake which autoconf libtool pkgconfig gcc-c++ libstdc++-static git wget tar make patch curl java-1.8.0-ibm.s390x java-1.8.0-ibm-devel.s390x
# Install Cmake 3.1.0 from source wget http://www.cmake.org/files/v3.1/cmake-3.1.0.tar.gz gzip -d cmake-3.1.0.tar.gz tar xvf cmake-3.1.0.tar cd cmake-3.1.0 ./configure --prefix=/cmake-3.1.0/cmake make && sudo make install export PATH=$WORK_DIR/cmake-3.1.0/bin:$PATH
# Check out the Snappy-Java source code: cd $WORK_DIR git clone https://github.com/xerial/snappy-java.git cd snappy-java git checkout 1.1.7
# Set the JAVA_HOME environment variable export JAVA_HOME=/etc/alternatives/java_sdk_ibm export PATH=$JAVA_HOME/bin:$PATH java -version
# build the C++ code as well as the Java classes, and use Scala SBT to package the binaries into a JAR file make IBM_JDK_7=1 USE_GIT=1 GIT_SNAPPY_BRANCH=1.1.7 GIT_REPO_URL=https://github.com/google/snappy.git
ldd target/snappy-1.1.7-Linux-s390x/libsnappyjava.so
cd target echo ' import org.xerial.snappy.*; public class Test { public static void main(String[] args) { try { String input = "Hello snappy-java! Snappy-java is a JNI-based wrapper of " + "Snappy, a fast compresser/decompresser."; byte[] compressed = Snappy.compress(input.getBytes("UTF-8")); byte[] uncompressed = Snappy.uncompress(compressed);
String result = new String(uncompressed, "UTF-8"); System.out.println(result); } catch(Exception e){ System.out.println(e); } } } ' > Test.java
# Compile java example javac -cp ".:snappy-java-1.1.7.jar" Test.java
# Run example: java -cp ".:snappy-java-1.1.7.jar" Test > test_result.txt
#Following ouput should be observed: # ```Hello snappy-java! Snappy-java is a JNI-based wrapper of Snappy, a fast compresser/decompresser.```
echo 'Hello snappy-java! Snappy-java is a JNI-based wrapper of Snappy, a fast compresser/decompresser.' > expected_result.txt
result=`diff test_result.txt expected_result.txt`
if [ -z "$result" ] ; then exit 0 else exit 1 fi
